name: juancarlos
text: Y'know Pat still has some warm feelings in his heart for his dad if he hasn't taken the time to change his name from Father to Simon in his Call ID.

name: stuart
text: I think his Caller ID can only support 5 predefined names.

name: coridoroiy
text: and three of them are Foucault

name: ganymedeio
text: Je ne sais une dick.

name: pigeon_street
text: Dicque.

name: malachi
text: Oh shit oh damn, I've been goin' through the archives, and I see all these guys from years abd months ago, and here you are posting from 13 HOURS AGO, oh man don't leave me.

name: scifigrl47
text: Yes, the tiny yellow blocks of a new post on old strips.  Have you been stalking pigeon_street since your chance meeting?

name: evilbobikus
text: Emphasizing that you are calling your father by his first name is one of the worst things you can do though.  I still regret every time I called my late father John.

name: fermatprime
text: aw... Huuuuuuuuuugs!

name: haruspex
text: My brother used to call my father by his name. Are you my brother? You have to tell me if you are.

name: shinkusan
text: It is the rules

name: lolsworth
text: I call my father "git"

name: johnnyrocker
text: His dad seems so frigging nice.

name: circadin
text: Pat is so mad that his phone is ringing.

name: saint
text: that made me laugh, too. He went from shocked that the phone was ringing, to "WHO THE FUCK would CALL ME?!"

name: hateandwar
text: Who calls anybody anymore?! How rude!

name: awko
text: Pat's attitude towards his father is very similar to my brother's attitude towards me.

name: aperson
text: If you would just cut it out with the damn kazoo ...

name: spinynorman
text: Is there a version of the William Tell Overture that isn't enthusiastic? It would take effort and serious funding...

name: killingthejay
text: or you know...just switch it to a minor key and slow it down to funeral march speed.  not difficult to do.  but still would sound pretty ridiculous on a kazoo.

name: anzio
text: Maybe I'll do this because I essentially do nothing anyways, and a hobby is good.

name: mangtastic
text: Probably if it was an abridged version played by a junior high school orchestra.  That is the most likely candidate for an unenthusiastic performance of any Rossini piece.

name: darthemed
text:
Man it is kind of weird but I can actually empathize with the first two panels.

First ring: "A call? Unexpected!"
Second ring: "I hate the sound of a ringing phone."

name: fuckyoufriday
text: "A phone is like a woman who hates you. It's all she does."

name: shemmjacc
text: Five'd for absolutely irrational hatred. Always funny.

name: apocowarg
text: it's not irrational to hate people who play the kazoo loudly into a phone and attend Burning Man.

name: dans
text: Hell, a childhood filled with that would probably turn me into a hating asshole, too.

name: gumfish
text: Hey, nice avatar. Sammy Nickle the Juicy Pickle! God I love that rhyme.

name: belgand
text:
Hmm.. I was thinking that this is someone whom I wish to know better.

For me the problem has always been one of not understanding how people who go to Burning Man are also the kind of people who can afford to go to Burning Man.

Apparently Google got pretty empty that weekend though.

name: hateandwar
text: Anybody here ever been to Burning Man? I've always been curious but I've never managed the courage to take several hundred dollars and a trip across the country just to hang out and get high with hippies. I realize there are other things happening at Burning Man besides that, I'm just having a hard time imagining what they are.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Yup, I've been for 5 years running. It's a hell of a thing, aside from the dirty fucking hippies and ravers and new age pussy hounds. I just consider it a big camping trip with my friends, and beer, and titties.

name: carlyle
text:
It's not irrational.

Pat is from circumstances.

name: dueledge
text: brilliant character exposition here, and worth a five for that all by itself (the rest just makes it so awesome).

name: themacktruck
text: why are the "F" "A" and "E" all capitalized?

name: professorhazard
text: Try to write them lowercase in such a way as that font allows.

name: shutup_shutup
text:
[IMGS OFF]

The "e" is a little tough to read out of context but it'd be clear enough.

name: soticoto
text: The alt-text wins my vote high.

name: quantumcasaba
text: I would go to Burning Man with Simon and Marcel.

name: tekende
text: I would like to go to Burning Man someday.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Road trip!

name: sirfrederick
text: They do sound fun to go to events with. I'm sure they'd be able to introduce you to cool, unintimidating booth operators.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: I hurt my foot, man.

name: gournal
text: "No one should use a computer while they are at a party unless that computer is a pacemaker which is running their heart."

name: corpsey
text: Ain't no better exclamation of surprise than "Egads!". People should use it more often.

name: dasuta
text:
Ray threw that phone so hard, it traveled a solid mile before hitting the ground.

That man is legend.

name: tekende
text: Ray did not throw that phone. Ray is not here.

name: fineoakstructure
text: o/ Where is Ray? o/

name: ouroboros
text: in heaven

name: achilleselbow
text: Is this the first intimation of Pat's 'family curse'?

name: direhaggis
text: That is some entirely wonkified capitalization what all on 'Father'. Pat must have fitfully keyed the thing in before settling in to call NPR and bitch about barbers.

name: quinlaenar
text:
It's because its typed onto a phone caller id system that uses the 7 lines for each thing.
_ _ _
|_ |_| |_ |_ |_ _
| | | |_ | | |_ |

is the only way you can spell it with those things, seeing as how you have only this shape to work with.
_
|_|
|_|
_ _ _ _ _
|_| |_ | _| |_ |_ |_| |_ |
| | |_| |_ |_| |_ | _| | | |
_ _ _
| |_| | |_| _ | | |_| |_| _
_| |_| |_ |_| | | |_| | | |
_ _
|_ |_ | | |_| |_| |_| _|
_| |_ |_| |_| |_| | | _| |_

M and W are the only two I couldn't figure out how to make work...

name: quinlaenar
text: Oh, of course Assetbar ate that post that I spent 10 minutes working on and proofreading to make sure I wouldn't look stupid.

name: possums
text: First 2/3 panels are golden like the sun.

name: theryuujin
text: do you think it is rad to play the kazoo over the phone?

name: autrepoupee
text:
My mom left me three voicemails last night.

All three of them were her playing a kazoo, or a similar wind instrument (perhaps a slide-whistle), and it was always the same tune. I guess she was trying to perfect it, or something.

Three voicemails, no words.

name: heccibiggs
text: Is this a true thing?

name: autrepoupee
text: True as the day is long, it was the strangest set of voicemails in the history of Man.

name: heccibiggs
text: Wow. Have a couple of chubbies for bizarrity (pass one along to your mum, uhh, mom).

name: wankerman
text: Comment left by wankerman ignored.

name: gamemeister27
text:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oau9gtG5Om8

Yeah....
